name: api_rendering_Shader
description: Shader scripts used for all rendering.

properties.name: isSupported
properties.description: Can this shader run on the end-users graphics card? (Read Only)

properties.name: keywordSpace
properties.description: The local keyword space of this shader.

properties.name: maximumLOD
properties.description: Shader LOD level for this shader.

properties.name: passCount
properties.description: Returns the number of shader passes on the active SubShader.

properties.name: renderQueue
properties.description: The default render queue for this shader. (Read Only)

properties.name: subshaderCount
properties.description: Returns the number of SubShaders in this shader.
